item.title: About
item.description: Olga Nehmad After dabbling in tech support, QA, linguistics and leadership, I’m setting forth on my path to become a better researcher. In my spare time (whatever’s left after parenting my toddler) I enjoy fantasy/sci-fi, gaming, music, knitting and whatever other hyperfixation I’ve developed that month.

item.title: A Beginning
item.description: It all started a year ago, almost to the day, when I realized I hated my job.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email me at oggiebesk@gmail.com. You can find me on LinkedIn as well.
